entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:17 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tadoule Lake Airport 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -35.8°C
Pressure: 102.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -39.8°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
